full_text: From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) @usdoj.gov To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 13:29:15 +0000 Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier. Tim On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelieveable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/ Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone DOJ-OGR-00024384

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG) (b)(6) @usdoj.gov To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov Cc: Ray Ormond (b)(6) @bop.gov Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 13:29:15 +0000
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier. Tim

On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelieveable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/
Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein and related news reports. The email contains redactions and a link to a Breitbart article.
